conversations.question: How many vision tests am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to one free vision test per year, including intraocular pressure testing

conversations.question: What is the discount on glasses?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 70% discount on glasses up to 1000 NIS, with replacement every two years

conversations.question: What is the discount on contact lenses?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 60% discount on contact lenses, including an annual treatment kit

conversations.question: What is the discount on laser vision correction surgery?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 50% discount on laser surgery, including preliminary examinations

conversations.question: What is the discount on special vision aids?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 70% discount on low vision devices, including trial equipment rental

conversations.question: What are the benefits for children's treatment?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to free treatment for children up to age 18, including lazy eye treatment

conversations.question: How many vision tests am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Meuhedet Gold member, you are entitled to two free vision tests per year, including retinal mapping

conversations.question: What is the discount on glasses?
conversations.answer: As a Meuhedet Gold member, you are entitled to a 65% discount on glasses up to 1200 NIS, with replacement every year and a half

conversations.question: What is the discount on contact lenses?
conversations.answer: As a Meuhedet Gold member, you are entitled to a 55% discount on contact lenses, including free fitting examination

conversations.question: What is the discount on laser vision correction surgery?
conversations.answer: As a Meuhedet Gold member, you are entitled to a 45% discount on laser surgery, including follow-up treatments

conversations.question: What is the discount on special vision aids?
conversations.answer: As a Meuhedet Gold member, you are entitled to a 65% discount on low vision devices, including personal training

conversations.question: What are the benefits for children's treatment?
conversations.answer: As a Meuhedet Gold member, you are entitled to free treatment for children up to age 18, including vision training

conversations.question: How many vision tests am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to free vision tests every six months, including visual field testing

conversations.question: What is the discount on glasses?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to a 75% discount on glasses up to 900 NIS, with replacement every two years

conversations.question: What is the discount on contact lenses?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to a 65% discount on contact lenses, including free trial lenses

conversations.question: What is the discount on laser vision correction surgery?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to a 55% discount on laser surgery, including a 5-year warranty

conversations.question: What is the discount on special vision aids?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to a 75% discount on low vision devices, including technical support

conversations.question: What are the benefits for children's treatment?
conversations.answer: As a Clalit Gold member, you are entitled to free treatment for children up to age 18, including vision development testing
